verbose_text: The results showed that different from the cytoplasmic localization of SPHK1 in Vector and si-ctrl cells, ORMDL3 overexpression resulted in SPHK1 localizing to the plasma membrane, thereby indicating SPHK1 activation (XREF_FIG); ORMDL3 suppression caused no change of SPHK1 localization (XREF_FIG).
evidence: ORMDL3 suppression caused no change of SPHK1
